node.text: Eat and thrive, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ Is life not sweet? Could it be sweeter?~ May our lives be as sweet as my harvest, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ Will you sing and work with me, =player.formalAddressTerm=?~ Hey, oh-way, it's a long way down, from the reaches of the Spindle to the humble ground...~ Hey, oh-way, banana tree, count the bunches, one-two-three...~ Hey, oh-way, how I spend my days, working in the ruins of the ancient place...~ Hey, oh-way, live wild and free, fear not the dacca or the quick adiyys...~ Eat bananas every day to keep your mind quick, but don't eat too many or you might get sick!
